sentences.english: We will make an all-out effort to make your stay in Fujian comfortable and pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 我們會盡力使您在閩期間過得舒適愉快。

sentences.english: We often jokingly call him “Prime Minister”.
sentences.chinese: 我們經常戲稱德閩是總理。

sentences.english: I hear Fujian is also called "Min". What does that mean?
sentences.chinese: 我聽說福建也叫做“閩”。這是什麼意思？

sentences.english: Demin dropped in on me when their troupe is on tour here yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 德閩昨天來這裏巡迴演出，順便來學校看我。
